original_title: Chico Bento em Óia a Onça e Otros Causo!
overview: While taking a walk, Chico Bento, a boor living in the backwoods of Brazil, tells his friend Zé Lelé and girlfriend Rosinha some fantastic stories happened to him: he'd been turned into a frog, been attacked by ants and by an animal resembling a jaguar, and some other doubtful cases.
title: Chico Bento em Óia a Onça e Otros Causo!
